channel.title: Life Stories on Deepanshu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Life Stories on Deepanshu's Blog

item.title: To face insurmountable work, smile.
item.description: The original article is available here. Please refer to that for a better reading experience. Hi, this is Season 3 of Everyday People. This week, Mr. Deepanshu Gupta. (Interview conducted: 28 Jan â€” 2 Feb, 2020) Who are you, what do you do, and what is your current side project? I am a software engineer recently turned manager, leading the Android and iOS teams at Zendrive. The main focus of the job has changed from making the product succeed to making every single one of the engineers reporting to me succeed.
